Body:
Description: We can currently only see a maximum of "200" devices or computers in the admin console, even when we select 500 or ALL.  

We are also in need of being able to easily add a detected device, such as an incorrectly detected device, and add it to a whitelist or custom allowance.
Next Steps Updated: Awaiting customer's response

What We've Learned Updated: 3/31/2025

- Customer wanting instruction on how to set up a device using VID and PID and not serial number. 
- Sent customer instructions on how to do this
- Sent customer follow up email
